description: Postpartum hemorrhage (PPH) is severe bleeding after childbirth that can be life-threatening if not treated promptly. Experts emphasise rapid identification and a standardised, multidisciplinary approach to management

Stay active, keep dangerous blood clots at bay
description: When a person is immobile, blood stagnates in the veins of the legs, and promotes clots formation at the valves present in those veins. This is worsened by inactivity of the calf muscles. Any form of mobility pumps venous blood from the lower limbs towards the heart, and hence should be vigorously encouraged

title: 'Lalu known as management guru': Tejashwi reacts after charges framed in IRCTC case
description: A Delhi court ordered charges to be framed against RJD leader Tejashwi Yadav, his mother Rabri Devi, and father Lalu Prasad Yadav in the IRCTC scam. Tejashwi Yadav decried the move as political vendetta ahead of Bihar polls, vowing to fight the case. The charges stem from alleged irregularities in leasing railway hotels.

title: Arundhati Roy book: Kerala HC dismisses PIL seeking stay on sale over cover photo showing her smoking
description: The lawyer-petitioner argued the book lacked a statutory health warning on smoking, violating the 2013 Tobacco Act, but the book was later found to carry a disclaimer about smoking’s ill effects on the back

title: Car stunt goes wrong: Noida man fined Rs 57,500 after viral video
description: A Greater Noida man was fined Rs 57,500 after a viral video showed him performing dangerous car stunts, including high-speed drifting, on public roads. Noida Traffic Police took swift action, issuing the hefty fine for reckless and dangerous driving, as documented in the footage.

description: Kannan Gopinathan resigned from the service in 2019, protesting against the abrogation of Article 370 in Jammu and Kashmir

description: Despite Kolkata's reputation as India's safest city, female students in West Bengal face a growing crisis of insecurity. Recent brutal assaults, like the Durgapur gang rape, highlight persistent gaps in campus security and institutional accountability. Chief Minister Mamata Banerjee's advice for women to stay indoors has drawn widespread condemnation, reinforcing a culture of victim-blaming rather than addressing systemic failures.

title: Amoebic infection confirmed in three-year-old boy in Kerala’s Kannur
description: Lab analysis of cerebrospinal fluid samples confirms presence of amoeba species, raising concerns of amoebic meningoencephalitis. The child’s condition is reported to be stable

The film showed strong growth, outperforming 'Sunny Sanskari Ki Tulsi Kumari' significantly. Despite a slow start on its twelfth day, 'Kantara' continues its impressive run, captivating audiences nationwide.

Digital rights debate: SC rejects doctor’s WhatsApp plea; suggests Zoho’s Arattai
description: The Supreme Court of India has ruled that access to private messaging platforms like WhatsApp is not a fundamental right. A doctor's petition seeking restoration of her blocked account was dismissed, with the court suggesting alternative apps like Zoho's Arattai. The ruling emphasizes that users must adhere to platform policies for privately operated services.

The hostages were escorted by Israeli forces from Gaza. This release is a significant milestone in the Gaza ceasefire efforts. It brings hope to families affected by the conflict. The operation was named 'Operation Returning Home'.

description: India is establishing a National Critical Mineral Stockpile to secure rare earth elements, crucial for green technologies, following China's export curbs. The program aims for a two-month reserve, encouraging private sector involvement.

Sara Tendulkar's b'day: Saaniya and Arjun celebrate; share unseen pictures
description: Sara Tendulkar celebrated her 28th birthday with heartfelt wishes from family and friends, including her brother Arjun and his fiancée Saaniya Chandhok. Sachin Tendulkar also shared warm wishes to his daughter. The celebrations offered a personal glimpse into the lives of the renowned cricketing family, with social media abuzz with heartfelt messages and shared memories.

MTV to shut down music channels: Why the network is closing its iconic music channels
description: MTV is set to close five of its iconic music channels, including MTV Music, MTV 80s, MTV 90s, Club MTV, and MTV Live, by December 31, 2025. This decision, driven by changing viewing habits and cost-cutting measures, marks the end of an era for music television. The brand will continue its presence on social media and the Paramount+ streaming service.

title: Watch: Trump gets 'thank you' note at Tel Aviv beachfront; Air Force One flies over it
description: US President Donald Trump arrived in Israel, greeted by a large "Thank You" banner along the Tel Aviv coastline. During his four-hour visit, he met with hostage families, held talks with Prime Minister Netanyahu, and addressed lawmakers. The visit coincides with the second anniversary of the October 7th attacks and the return of some hostages.

title: Ranji Trophy: Vaibhav Sooryavanshi adds new feather to his cap; named Bihar's vice-captain
description: Bihar Cricket Association has appointed 14-year-old Vaibhav Sooryavanshi as vice-captain for the upcoming Ranji Trophy season. Suryavanshi, a prodigious talent with an IPL century and youth international achievements, makes his debut alongside captain Sakibul Gani. Bihar aims to bounce back after relegation to the Plate League.

When is Diwali 2025 being celebrated across India, on October 20 or 21?
description: Diwali 2025 is on October 20. The Amavasya Tithi begins on October 20 and ends on October 21. Lakshmi Puja is scheduled between 7:08 PM and 8:18 PM. This festival signifies the victory of light over darkness. Homes will be decorated, and families will gather to celebrate prosperity and togetherness. The festival emphasizes renewal and gratitude.

title: Bengaluru rides turn risky: Businessman slapped, influencer trapped, passenger abused
description: Bengaluru commuters face alarming safety issues. A businessman was assaulted for questioning a toll detour, a call centre employee was attacked after cancelling an auto ride, and a social media influencer was trapped during an Uber trip. These incidents highlight growing concerns for passenger security on city roads.

title: Sudden vision loss in a teenager triggered by exam stress, eye surgeon explains
description: A 16-year-old boy presented with sudden vision loss, baffling doctors as his eye exams were normal.  So what has really gone wrong?  The teenage boy was brought in by his mother with complaints of sudden vision loss, the doctor said. The boy said that he could only see light and nothing else. But during the evaluation, the boy’s eye structure and function appeared normal.  So what went wrong? Take a look.

description: A 10-year-old boy at a Hyderabad children's home was allegedly sexually assaulted by a supervisor on multiple occasions since May. Telangana: 33-year-old labourer raped, tied to tree; dies of injuries
description: A 33-year-old married woman, found tied to a tree and unconscious in Medak, succumbed to her injuries on Sunday. Police suspect she was raped and then abandoned, with head injuries and bleeding from other parts of her body leading to her death. An investigation is underway to identify the accused.

title: Bhopal: After fight over ‘change’, delivery boy returns with 8, thrashes 2
description: A dispute over change for a Rs 474 delivery escalated into violence in Bhopal's Kolar area. A quick commerce company's delivery boy returned with several colleagues, armed with sticks, and assaulted two helpers of a businessman. The group caused a significant disturbance for over half an hour before fleeing. A video of the incident has since gone viral.

title: Tech crash: Trump’s China tariffs causes $770 bn wipeout from Amazon, Nvidia, Tesla
description: Tech giants like Amazon, Nvidia, and Tesla faced a massive $770 billion market value drop following President Trump's threat of 100% tariffs on China and export controls.  This significant market downturn, the worst since April, also impacted the Nasdaq and S&P 500, with Bitcoin experiencing a sharp decline as well.
